title: Fragment, 1921-22-7, 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) with supplementary weft
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of green cut and uncut velvet on a yellow silk and metallic ground with some details in silver metal thread brocade. Design of tiny flowering branches in horizontal rows alternately leaning left and right.
